about.title: About me
about.me:
With over 4 years of experience in software development, I work on systems projects using Node.js, TypeScript, Express, and NestJS, as well as SQL/NoSQL databases and REST/GraphQL APIs. I have a strong foundation in React/Next.js, React Native for user-centric applications.

My experience also includes DevOps practices, AWS cloud deployment, and implementing robust security measures for reliable, scalable applications. I am driven by innovation and thrive in dynamic, growth-focused environments.

spectrum_description: Create stunning visual profiles and build high-quality professional communities and referral networks.
rentify_description: A modern real estate management platform that connects property managers with potential tenants.

contact.or_contact_me: or you can contact me on
